mapper.insert:
insert into vehi_danger (id, vehiNo, vehiType, ownerEnterprise, scrappedState, illicitState, overdueExamineState, dangerType, ownerGener, ownerOrgId, vehicle_id, dangerTime, correctTime, correctState, dangerDesc, remark, version, isDeleted, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, createBy, createDepCd, updateBy, updateDepCd) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehino,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownerenterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scrappedstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.illicitstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.overdueexaminestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dangertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownergener,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownerorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dangertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.correcttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.correctstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dangerdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdepcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatedepcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT danger.*,org.orgNm,org1.orgNm as superNm, CASE danger.vehiType WHEN '01' THEN '大型车' WHEN '02' THEN '小型车' ELSE '其他' END vehiNoTypeText FROM vehi_danger danger LEFT JOIN ess_organization org ON danger.ownerOrgId=org.id LEFT JOIN ess_area area ON org.area_id=area.id LEFT JOIN vehicle vehi ON danger.vehicle_id=vehi.id LEFT JOIN ess_organization org1 ON org1.id=org.superOrg_id WHERE danger.id=#{id}
